note: Lifelong SC educator and over-educated librarian—still learning. Various degrees in English, Rhetoric(s), Cinema. Believe in science and data—immunity debt is not a thing. ❤️🦣🌳🐬🌏 🌊, children, 🇺🇸 and 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿. Grateful for Biden/Harris. Not a fan of treason, obstruction, or grift. Love peonies (breeder-in-training). My pony and mini-donkey play-fight each other every morning before breakfast. I ❤️ Sheldrick Wildlife Trust and their work with elephants and rhinos.
